places_with_reviews.name: Morickap Resort
address: Banasura Sagar Dam Road Pinangode P O, Vengapally Village Vythiri, Pinangode, Kalpetta, Vengapally, Kerala 673122, India

reviews.text: The stay at Morickap was really good. The food was exceptional, and so was the experience. The resort is nestled between a coffee estate and is nature at its best. There are activities for kids like zip lines, Burma bridge, Rick climbing, football court, swimming pool, etc.  The resort also gives you the opportunity to trek in the vicinity. There is a bonfire with live music. We got a bonus as there were some additional musicians among the guests. A great experience. Spoilers, there were a few monkeys in the area. Also, the area in front of the room was a bit cluttered. I recommend the stay here.

During our stay their hospitality  was excellent.night music&campfire was enjoyable. Professional and courteous staffs.property was clean and stylish with excellent room service. Adventurous activities were good but they charge 500rs per persons.location of the resort was easily accessible. Food was good can include more non veg items to the menu as well as for the breakfast also they can add few more dishes. Overall its an awesome stay and special thanks to all the staffs for an excellent hospitality

The Morickap Resort offers a serene escape nestled in nature's embrace. From the moment you arrive, you're greeted with warm hospitality and a breathtaking view of the surrounding landscape. The resort's accommodations are cozy yet luxurious, providing the perfect balance of comfort and rustic charm. Whether you're lounging by the pool, exploring nearby hiking trails, or indulging in delicious local cuisine at the on-site restaurant, every moment at Morickap Resort is a delight. With attentive staff and a tranquil atmosphere, it's the ideal destination for relaxation and rejuvenation.

It's a beautiful property with great hospitality. There are many activities you can do, your kids can do. Swimming pool is well maintained. Food is really nice...Spa was a nice experience. Evening live music concert was also entertaining. It was a good experience.

Good place and well maintained.  Food was good. Need to add more authentic Kerala dishes along with the other choices. Staff was very helpful and kind. Good parking. Rooms are well maintained and good singers in the evening program.

places_with_reviews.name: GReaT trails Wayanad by GRT Hotels
address: Puzhakkal, Padinjarathara Road, Post, Pinangode, Vengapally, Kerala 673122, India

reviews.text: Visited the property with my husband and 7 months old baby. The property is amazing with mesmerizing lush green surrounded nearby the rooms hotel and everywhere. There are many activities for kids and adults . They arrange campfire cultural dance nature walks etc which really adds up to the memorable experience. The hospitality of all the staff members is worth talking about, they keep checking with you often about your experience and if everything is going well during your stay.  All the staff members are very kind and greet the customers very well. There was a foot massage provided by the resort as complimentary however the person didn't seem to be interested since it was just complimentary service, didn't even have an ok experience with the foot massage, apart from it i recommend visiting this resort for your quick vacation from Bangalore.

It was a wonderful experience had courtesy great trails resort. Apart from the mesmerizing location the hospitality was super excellent. Foods was very taste, It was the best resort. Me and my husband had very nice time. Thank you team Great trails Wayanad.
And special thanks too Mr.Albin

We had a superb stay here in India's one of the best 5 star resorts. What a great hospitality we had here from the resort staff. Property was very clean, stylish with excellent service while we  had dinner. Food was good and great value for money and service was attentive and efficient.

The rooms ,halls,  food, pool, sports area, the greenery , the staff, the manager, guards -everything was so terrific and fantastic. I have no words to explain. We enjoyed a lot and stay was super comfortable.  Infinity pool was just WOW with such an amazing view

From the moment we arrived until departure, the staff exceeded expectations." "Exceptional customer service, with a commitment to making our stay comfortable. Rooms were spotless, and the facilities were well-maintained. The hotel's cleanliness surpassed my expectations. The hotel restaurant offered delicious meals with a diverse menu." "Prompt room service and food that surpassed our expectations." Rooms washrooms were the best .We haven't had seen such cleanliness and ambience in washrooms. They were so big in size.

Our welcome was the BEST OF all the time!!

A big and special thanks to Chef Vishnu, Manager Subhash ji, Guard Ramcharan and Massage Girl-MPI. They are so excellent human beings and took care of us like family members

I will surely come again to this beautiful resort .

checked out from the property today, had booked 5 rooms in total as i was travelling with my family.
The property is very beautiful with good rooms (the ceiling fans are squeaky)and good food but unfortunately the front office/ reception staff were very rude and seemed to be least interested in serving their clients, seemed as if they where forced to work there and looked irritated most of the time.The hotel provided us 15 minutes foot massage but the therapist finished it with just  5-7 min and  wanted to somehow get over with it.

we had booked 3 rooms for two nights and after this experience ,were thinking of cancelling the booking .Why should we pay our money for this pathetic treatment, it was only because we had no other choice as we couldn’t find any accommodation nearby, so we dropped the plan.
The security/bellboys and the lady staff taking orders at the restaurant were really friendly on the other hand, and did their job properly.
Would recommend the property for the rooms, ambience and not for their service.
Very nice resort. Good food, very hospitable staff. They offer bunch of activities during the stay. Very kid friendly. My kid loved the stay. Special thanks to Staff who made our stay so special

places_with_reviews.name: LetStay Adithya Nature Resort & Spa
address: 12th bridge, Pookode, lake link road, Jubilee hills, Vythiri, Kerala 673576, India

reviews.text: I really hated everything about the place. First of all the pool wasn't cleaned. The water was green in colour. The road to it is very steep. Nothing was cleaned and there was also paint ripping off the wall. The food took 2 hours to reach our room and the dirty plates weren't even cleaned untill we checked out. The food was also a letdown and I expected more. Overall the experience was not good. I don't recommend.

Located in a scenic location with many facilities available, the resort gives you an okay-ish experience. The resort has a lot of scope to improve. The villas had very poor lighting even inside the bathroom which surely could be maintained properly. The washbasin inside the bathroom also had poor flow of water with the presence of spider webs inside the rooms as well, as well as the frequent visits by ants and other bugs as part of nature's visitors. The water heater in some of the villas seldom work, and the sheets smell very bad. The blankets provided for extra beds also smelled bad and was very dusty. But the services provided were very good as they did provide fresh sheets after complaining and cleaned the rooms daily. The food was great and so was the entire ambience. The workers helped us with our luggage and with all our necessities. There's plenty of parking available, and the security men and staff were very friendly plus the resort is located away from all the traffic jammed roads ensuring peace for all the visitors.

Adithya Resort and Spa is one of the best hotels/resorts that i ever visited . The staffs/receptionists were really helpful and friendly. The location of the said spot is absolutely perfect. The rooms are well equipped and properly maintained.Food prepared is average . Housekeeping is not upto the mark . Overall ⭐⭐⭐⭐

The resort is built in a good area with forest like feeling but the rooms need lots of maintenance. Heater not working, steps are broken  in villa. Lots of monkeys in the property so have to be careful with closing window etc. toilets average too much insects inside the rooms like ants.
Food is very average with limited choices
Parking facility is good and they have place for driver stay and food

It’s more suited for budget family holiday with kids. The villas are medium expensive

The morning view from balcony in Nov end with all the mist was worth it. There are different caregories of rooms. Went as a team and got to explore more than 1. The electrical appliances in my room were not functioning intially, which was resolved.

places_with_reviews.name: Windflower Resorts & Spa Vythiri Wayanad
address: Annapoorna Estate, Survey No. 40/ 2B, Resurvey No. 330/1, Vythiri Taluk, Achoornam, Kerala 673575, India

reviews.text:
Stayed there with my family for 5 days and had the fantastic time.
The villa we stayed at windflower was very spacious with a living room, bedroom, big glass covered bathroom and a balcony with jacuzzie. Entire villa was Extremely clean with all the luxury amenities including Bedsheets and towels were maintained really well.
Room Service and in-room dinning was phenomenal. The staffs were friendly and all just a phone call away and easy to reach all services and they have showed up without any delay. Food is all good with what they had and needs some more different varieties in vegetarian. 😄

Windflower Resort & spa is located in a quiet place in wayanad, surrounded by a tea estate. The resort is so big and cool, the rooms are so big and have a luxurious look, especially the bathroom. The balcony and hall are also so good. It is located at the top of the hill, where the view is so good. Spa service is good, valet parking is there. A morning tea estate wall is also offered.  The negative point is the taste of food should be improved and the swimming pool is not so good. Must try resort for relaxation.

Pampered by the hospitality.great room with splendid view. Bathroom was very spacious and clean. Right from day one to the last day of our journey - the service folks were always there to help with a big smile.food was too good- enjoyed by kids also-  the spread was  varied each day and enjoyable.Firecamp on request.Kids had games to play- carrom swimming pool,snake and ladder,chess,badminton,basket ball etc....enjoyed a well spent family time with family and friends in the resort

Overall Moderate experience.
Rooms are big and decent view of mountains.
Villas have quite big jacuzzi.
Needs to improve on service and hospitality, doesnt feel the luxury for cost you pay. Similar resorts have a better hospitality.
Food options are minimal but kind of just enough as it has what you need. Only beer available.
Breakfast spread is good enough.
Hi-tea is paid.
Food service was late.
Staff are friendly, quite are few can speak English.
They have good swimming pool, spa. Kids play area needs improvement and also indoor games needs maintenance.

Rooms are big but lack luxury for the amount you pay. TV is kept opposite the bed and you cannot watch sitting on the bed. Room flooring is very old and tiles are loose. The bathroom is very big but the cleanliness is ok. Kindly check other resorts before booking. There are no activities at all such as the play area / games are very old and broken.
Food is good

places_with_reviews.name: Amrezy Resort and Spa by StrideHotels
address: Amrezy Resort Rd, Chelode, Kerala 673576, India

reviews.text: Amrezy Spa and resorts by Strides is really good. The service was good and the rooms are spic and span. Food quantity could be a little better, but is definitely served hot and nice. The location is not very interior, quite close to Wayanad bus station. The view from the balcony is beautiful!!

One of the best resort to stay with family. Calm atmosphere, well maintained places. The views from balcony were fantastic. They only need to improve their response and timing. For everything we need to wait for a long!

Amrezy is a great place, which offers a amazing holiday destination. Me and my wife stayed here for 5days and 4 nights - Not even one day we felt the food was okay or not that great.
Food is top notch and a great hospitality. Snacks in the evening with Kerala style menu gives a glimpse of authentic Kerala food - 5/5
Rooms - Panaroma view rooms are great with an amazing view once you wake up, but the rooms are not like a suite. Hence people preferring to have a bigger space, might feel little crushed- 4/5.
Services - Dnt use much of indoor games but outdoor games like football, cricket and badminton place is good. Swimming pool is open from 8.00am to 8.00pm, the pool is very small and the max depth is 4’ feet. Which means pool is meant for kids play and not for adult - 3/5.
Overall a great place to visit during monsoon and during summer too. During summer mornings are misty but later the day it’s a bit hot. But if you’re staying in the room with AC on, you will feel pleasant and with an amazing view from the room glazing or balcony space - 5/5

Stayed with family for 2days, it was a very wonderful experience with nature. It is located in such a place. Very neatly maintained and very friendly staff. I recommend this resort for the wonderful stay with your family. Food is very good and clean.

Had an awesome stay! The staff was super helpful and their smiles made us feel at home. They let us check in early and check out late. The resort is nestled in a serene hill area, surrounded by trees. Rooms are well-kept, and the balcony view is lovely. The food was delicious, especially the pre-booked dinner with a set menu and the tasty buffet breakfast. The juices was very fresh and tasty. Perfect spot for a relaxing getaway with your special ones.

Two suggestions for the management:

1) Consider adding a manual lock inside the rooms to enhance security. During our early check-in, a staff member accidentally opened the door, possibly for room inspection before the next check-in. A manual lock would prevent such instances.
2) Instead of two beds placed together, consider having one king bed for better sleeping comfort. This adjustment would significantly improve the overall sleeping experience for guests.

places_with_reviews.name: Hipnoetic Stays
address: Hipnoetic Tea Planters Bungalow, Achoor Estate Road, Peringoda, Pozhuthana, Kerala 673575, India

reviews.text:
My experience was nothing short of magical, and can confidently say that this establishment has set a new standard for hospitality in Wayanad. If you're looking for an unforgettable stay,Hipnoetic stay is the place to be.

What truly stood out was the warmth and hospitality of the staff. From the moment i arrived, were greeted with genuine smiles and a level of courtesy that made me feel truly welcome. Each staff member went above and beyond to ensure our comfort, making our stay a memorable one.

The meals were a culinary journey through Kerala, with an impressive array of dishes that showcased the best of local cuisine. Every bite was a celebration of taste.

This was an amazing stay for us in the geodesic domes. It’s a one of a kind property set out in a tea plantation with lots of nooks to just laze around and enjoy the surrounds. The dome itself is well equipped and aesthetically designed, along with the deck chairs and a small framed hammock jutting out overlooking the plantation. The staff was also very warm and welcoming.

I visited with my family just for a night mainly to experience a dome styled stay. Glad we chose Hipnoetic stays. Every aspect about this property is very thoughtfully planned. Right from no desk concept at the reception till the many many outdoor seating areas and many many swings and huts. The property owner and her team are wonderful people. We can't forget our conversation with the owner mam who was very much willing to offer any kind of support even after we check out. Kudos to the entire team.

Had stayed for 2 nights at the property, lovely dome rooms with a great view. Even the rooms inside the bungalow were equally good , super spacious, and had a good vintage vibe.
The property had cute little outdoor corners everywhere to sit and relax! Great property to go with your family friends or with your spouse.

We recently stayed here nestled in the serene hills, and it was an unforgettable experience. The breathtaking scenery truly took our breath away. Our accommodation was cozy and well-equipped, providing a comfortable retreat. We enjoyed both  Dome and Bungalow. I liked the Bungalow more though -)

The staff were exceptionally friendly and attentive, ensuring that every aspect of our stay was enjoyable. Dining options were limited but delicious, with fresh, locally sourced ingredients shining in every dish.

While the resort was on the pricier side, the exceptional quality and service made it worth every penny. The journey to the resort was straightforward, with ample parking available. Additionally, I appreciated the resort's commitment to sustainability, evident in their eco-friendly practices. Overall, our stay was a perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of city life, and I would highly recommend it to anyone seeking a rejuvenating retreat in the hills.

Thanks to Aashiq (which mean lover in Hindi :P), Jaison, Henna for making this stay memorable.

places_with_reviews.name: Indeevara Retreat- Vythiri, Eco Friendly Luxury Resort
address: Pookkode Lake Banasura Sagar Cross Road 16 Kolichal, Vythiri, Kerala 673576, India

reviews.text:
Very Good Experience!! Stayed for 4 nights and the experience across room cleanliness, food, activities, service and spa was amazing.

Breakfast Buffet Spread is pretty decent. We took package of dinner as well and it was good.

Room were spacious and clean.

Activities include indoor games, pool, badminton etc.,

Don’t miss their Kerala ayurvedic spa. I went for their signature spa and was worth the price.

Overall value for money.

Elderly people may find it little difficult for ascend and descend as the rooms are on top of a cliff.

From the moment we stepped foot onto the grounds of this resort, we were greeted with warmth and hospitality. The amenities were top-notch, the food was exquisite, and the accommodations were luxurious and also treat yourself to a massage or spa - you won't regret it. Truly an unforgettable experience.

The resort as a whole is awesome. With superb views and a lot of fun stuff to enjoy. Had a great time here. We took the pool villa and the stay here was so much relaxing. They even have spa but we did not get enough time to explore it. As a whole good place for a relaxing weekend.
We had a nice and pleasant stay here. Staff is very co-operative and professional. Food served is tasty, however, there is lack of variety in food. That is the only feedback we can think of.

It was a calm and peaceful stay. Complete nature. Special thanks to Mr.Sasikumar for his friendly guidance. A special mention about Mr. Fazil, Ms.Anju and Mr.Abimanyu for their hospitality, patience,  politeness and outstanding food served over there. Almost all the staff make us feel homely. I highly recommend this resort. Thank you.

places_with_reviews.name: Jeevess Ayurveda Resort
address: JEEVESS AYURVEDIC HOSPITAL AND RESEARCH PVT LTD, PO, Vythiri, Kerala 673575, India

reviews.text:
Lush property with plenty to do and amazing staff. This is ideal for a relaxing vacation.
The in house kitchen is very good. Yoga and Kalaripayattu trainer were very helpful
This resorts sits on top of a hill with great views; to get to these views you have to cover a little over 1km on mud road. The hotel staff informed us beforehand and were always available to help

I stayed a week at Jeevess. I had a lovely time. The location is amazing, in the forest, and  surrounded only by nature. The design of the resort with the rooms and all is great as well, with beautiful views. The staff is very kind, they are very genuine, nurturing and caring. My treatments were great and I truly enjoyed the yoga and kalari sessions. I will definitely come back.

Suggestion: the food is very limited for an expat, also no diversity . For someone that is not used to indian spices and flavors it was a bit difficult. Some international healthy diet dishes cooked without spices and curries will be great.

Stayed 6 nights here it was pleasant and wonderful stay. It is peaceful, close to nature and great ambiance. Nice staff and their service.
En Ooru Tribal Village, Pookode Lake, Vythiri Park, Lakkidi View Point and Chain tree are nearer to Resort.

The resort ambience was lovely & very serene. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The staffs were always motivated to help us. The food was excellent, We Would like to thank the entire team for making our stay very cozy and comfortable

Blissful experience. Was so calming to wake up to the misty views from balcony and hear the dripping sounds of water drops dropping from the trees due to the mist. Liked the peaceful vibe of the small library, morning/evening walks in the resort around the fish pond, tea plants etc.

Food is decent but do not expect a wide spread like a traditional 4/5 star hotels.

Great staff, always welcoming and greeting.

Only issue is the off-road that spawns over 1-2 kms before the resort. While smaller cars can also get through, it would be great to have a better road as we might visit one another time if we plan for a trip around Wayanad.

places_with_reviews.name: Tea Terrace Vythiri Resort
address: near Mount Abu, 13/250B, POST, VALIYAPARA, Achooranam, Kerala 673575, India

reviews.text:
Our stay at the resort was incredibly peaceful and serene, with breathtaking views from every corner. We recently spent a few days there, welcoming the new year in 2024, and had an amazing time with our best friends! A special thanks to Mr. Owner and the entire staff, with a special mention to Ubaid/Ubair.

They went above and beyond to ensure our comfort in every possible way. The food they served was not only delectable but also surpassed our expectations. We found ourselves spending most of our time in the dining area, where the atmosphere was delightful. The trampoline was a big hit with the kids. Overall, we were delightfully pleased with our stay.

This is my second time visiting tea terrace vythiri  and I can say undoubtedly say they do an absolutely wonderful job everytime. The cottages have a very quaint charm about them while being spotless. The place itself is a very unique experience to be staying amidst a tea garden overlooking the hills. The Sunsets and sunrises from the rooms were absolute stunners. Service was prompt and Ubaid has  been a huge help during both my visits. The food tastes very home like and not restaurant types, which is what I personally prefer and I just loved that too. They're also expanding everytime with something new like rain dance and a pool wishing all the best to tea terrace for their future endeavours.
A personal suggestion would be to fix the approach road the last 1km is not an easy drive. And the food is on a slightly expensive side.
Otherwise a great experience,  Sure to visit again.

The tea terrace vythiri resort location was unbeatable, with stunning views of tea plantations and mountains from every room and cottage .large spacious rooms that  front and rear sitting decks to soak into the nature . All cottages are surrounded with lush green plantations and varieties of floras for a perfect beautiful view all around the property. There is an internal short trail that leads  to forest for the lovely exotic forest walks . I loved their authentic ayurvedic spa therapy that was relaxing and therapeutic.
The property is located in a quiet and serene place further of Vythiri. However the access road leading to hotel is not in a good condition and public transportation or other facilities are not nearby. Good to have own vehicle or hire transport , but at slightly high charges.
Nevertheless, the attention to detail in every corner of room and property , quality service, and adequate facilities make it the perfect choice for any traveler.

Amazing Resort and Amazing People!!👌🏻👌🏻😊 Few places inspire you to write a review…Tea Resort Vythiri, Wayanad is one such place.  Had a memorable family vacation at this enchanting resort built right within a tea estate.  Everyone including the children and senior citizens enjoyed the warm hospitality as the people at this resort go out of their way to ensure that everyone is well taken care of. The kids were busy enjoying the recreation room with books, table tennis, carrom, golf etc. There are hammocks and a trampoline too. Had a relaxing Kerala Ayurveda massage at the spa. The restaurant serves fresh and delicious food.  The Spanish themed villas are so cozy, clean and comfortable that you will not want to step out of this place.  It’s that beautiful.  Special thanks to Rafic and Ubaid who were so generous and caring.  Surreal experience.🙏🏻😊
Want to pamper your mind, body and soul? Then reserve this place for your next vacation……
Awesome place for calm and serene beauty of tea gardens. Staff is very courteous. The last 1 km drive to reach  resort is very stiff.

places_with_reviews.name: Pranavam Resort
address: Vasudeva Edom Pozhuthana, P.O, Peringoda, Vythiri, Pozhuthana, Kerala 673575, India

reviews.text:
A must stay if any is planning to visit Wayanad.
We really enjoyed our stay. I had my pet GSD with me and they boarder her without any hassle. Loved the food and it was prepared fresh. View from the cottage was an absolute beauty. A bit shout out for room cleanliness.
But, I would recommend the management to install bigger AC in the cottage.

We had a reunion of old friends at Pranavam last week. The experience was memorable because of the scenic location and wonderful service. The rooms were large, well appointed and very comfortable. The common areas are ideal for group activities. Value for money!

Best resort in Vythiri.

Rooms : Spacious, clean, and with a magnificent view from the balcony.

Staff : very much helpful and supportive.

Location  : Right in the middle of nature.

Amenities: Clean swimming pool, snooker table, swings, and some children games.

Food: Hygienic but average in taste.

Price : It is value for money for sure.

Overall experience: Wonderful. I would definitely love to visit again 💕 ☺️

I stayed at this property for 4 nights with family and friends in March 2023. Room was clean and vary large. Stay was very comfortable, staff was helpful and cooperative, they provided lovely local cuisine. Pool gave us opportunity to enjoy swimming and games.

We stayed at Pranavam for four days during our Veteran Air Force Officers reunion. Our stay was comfortable and enjoyable. Excellent response from the Owner and his entire staff. Excellent location. Great stay.
